CustomField.formula: IF( !ISPICKVAL(certificateStatus__c, ""), IMAGE("https://trustedshops--c.eu11.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0150Y0000026p33&oid=00D3L0000000dtj&lastMod=1507728038000", "Certificate Status", 19, 19) + " " + CASE( certificateStatus__c , "DISABLED", "disabled", "CANCELLED", "expired", "NO_AUDIT", "no audit", "INTEGRATION", "not yet released", "TEST", "test", "PRODUCTION", "valid" , ""), "")
CustomField.label: zz_certificate_status_image
